text: Pearl of Puerto, also referred to as Pearl of Puerto Princesa () is the largest known natural pearl in the world. It was found in the Philippines sea by a Filipino fisherman. It measures 2.2 feet (67 cm) long, 1 foot (30 cm) wide and weighs 34 kilograms (75 lb). == References == == External links == * Category:Individual pearls Category:Mollusc products Category:Culture of Palawan Category:Puerto Princesa
title: Pearl of Puerto
